_field_byte_integer.name: skip fraction:[0-127]#0 will always play, 127 will be extremely rare

item.Name: particle emission time{emitter time}{particle emit time}
particle emission time{emitter time}{particle emit time}
low res#renders heavy overdraw particles faster
low res tighter mask#requires depth fade
particle velocity relative to camera#makes parallel and perpindicular to velocity behave differently based upon camera motion

_field_real.name: low res switch distance:wu#the distance at which we switch from low res (close) to high res (far)
angle fade range:degrees#degrees beyond cutoff over which particles fade
angle fade cutoff:degrees#degrees away from edge-on where fade is total
motion blur translation scale#affects billboard tilt from observer motion
motion blur rotation scale#affects billboard tilt from observer turning
motion blur aspect scale#affects aspect ratio stretching from particle and observer motion

_field_char_integer.name: level of smallest mipmap to use
level of largest mipmap to use

item.Name: particle emission time{emitter time}{particle emit time}
particle emission time{emitter time}{particle emit time}
particle emission time{emitter time}{particle emit time}

_field_struct.name: color:RGB#controls how the color of the particle changes as a function of its input

item.Name: particle emission time{emitter time}{particle emit time}

particle emission time{emitter time}{particle emit time}

_field_struct.name: intensity#multiplies color to give dynamic range outside [0,1]

item.Name: particle emission time{emitter time}{particle emit time}
particle emission time{emitter time}{particle emit time}
particle emission time{emitter time}{particle emit time}

_field_struct.name: alpha#separate from color, controls how the particle fades as a function of its input

_field_explanation.name: Mesh data, if this is a mesh particle

_field_word_integer.name: block index data#divide by 1024 for count, remainder is start index
block index data#divide by 1024 for count, remainder is start index
bitmaps#divide by 1024 for count, remainder is start index
vertex real#divide by 1024 for count, remainder is start index
pixel real#divide by 1024 for count, remainder is start index
destination index#D3D constant index or sampler index

_field_byte_integer.name: source index#into constant tables below, unless this is an extern parameter
type specific#bitmap flags or shader component mask
